attributes.action: Create an equivalent to the NHS for animals only
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It would be a great idea if there was a free health sevice similar to the NHS but catered solely for animals. Less people would leave their pets in a bad state due to not being able to pay vets fees. Less animals would be abandoned. Animals are almost human so the same care should be given to them
